Title: LRO LROC DEM, Gruithuisen Domes, 4m Color Slope Hazard
Abstract: 这是一张专题彩色斜坡危险图，来源于Gruithusen Domes的当地斜坡图LRO_NAC_slope_4m_36N320E_2mp.tif。斜坡危险分类的颜色范围是任意的，但代表了最近的着陆器和火星车设计，其中斜坡比例相当于4米的车辆直径。
Projection:
PROJCS['Equirectangular Moon',
	GEOGCS['GCS_Moon',
		DATUM['D_Moon',SPHEROID['Moon_localRadius',1737400,0]],
		PRIMEM['Reference_Meridian',0],UNIT['degree',0.0174532925199433]],
	PROJECTION['Equirectangular'],
	PARAMETER['latitude_of_origin',0],
	PARAMETER['central_meridian',180],
	PARAMETER['standard_parallel_1',36],
	PARAMETER['false_easting',0],
	PARAMETER['false_northing',0],UNIT['metre',1,AUTHORITY['EPSG','9001']]]
